## PointerController.setNonVRMode() method

Set to non-VR mode.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setNonVRMode(v: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  v | boolean |  |

**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

In non-VR mode, teleport do not work.
